title: Kadyrovo, Kugarchinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
text:
Kadyrovo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Volostnovsky Selsoviet, <a href="Kugarchinsky%20District">Kugarchinsky District</a>, <a href="Bashkortostan">Bashkortostan</a>, Russia. The population was 127 as of 2010. There are 2 streets.
Geography.
Kadyrovo is located 34 km northwest of <a href="Mrakovo%2C_Kugarchinsky_District%2C_Republic_of_Bashkortostan">Mrakovo</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Tyulyabayevo is the nearest rural locality.
